reviewText:
Lusty Latin Ladies is a two video set that was released on June 6, 2000. Lusty Latin Ladies is the follow-up to Hot Latin Ladies. Maria Checca, who was in Hot Latin Ladies, is in this on too. Video one (Lusty Latin Ladies) is one hour and one minute long and is hosted by The Baka Boyz: Eric V. and Nick V. Video one stars the following twelve ladies.

Maria Checa-Columbia
August 1994 Playmate of the Month
Sonia Flores-Mexico
Miriam L. Gonzalez-Puerto Rico
Monica Mendez-Mexico
Iveth Cortez-Honduras
Ida-Peru
Paola Aravena-Chile
Tera Patrick-Argentina
February 2000 Penthouse Pet of the Month
Nina Camille-Mexico
Amelia Nicole Garduno-Puerto Rico
Lucia Loza-Mexico
Kat Castillo-Mexico

As you can see, Mexico leads the way with five ladies and the only other country that is represented more then once is Puerto Rico. All twelve ladies are beautiful and sexy to look at. Below are the follow segments in this video.

Photo Shoot-Topless first half\nude second half, but worth the wait
El Matador-Complete nudity is less then a minute
Dance With Me-Wait about three minutes and the nudity begins
La Bandita-Two Nude Ladies
W-Love Late Night-Limited nudity
Desperado-Wait a few minutes before the two lovely ladies go nude
Aztec Princess-Two sexy and beautiful nude ladies

El Matador and W-Love Late Night were the two biggest disappointments. Also if you gave the two hosts less air time, then this video would have been even better. Lusty Latin Ladies gets an AAA+++.

Video two is seventeen minutes long. The first four minutes are dedicated to the making of Lusty Latin Ladies. The remaining thirteen minutes is dedicated to Maria Checa- August 1994 Playmate of the Month. Some of the clips on the video were from the Hot Latin Ladies video. There were only two segments that she is truly nude, otherwise it is a disappointment. I don't think Maria would have cut it as a Penthouse Pet or a Hustler Honey. This video gets a B+. Overall the two videos together get an A-. I would have given it a higher grade if the Maria Checa was not included.

VHS PREVIEW
Shagalicious: British Babes

DVD FEATURES

Play Program
Chapter List
1) Baka Boys Introduction
2) Photo Shoot
3) El Matador
4) Dance With Me
5) Baka Boys Rest
6) La Bandita
7) Maria
8) Love Late Night
9) Desperado
10) Aztec Princess
11) End Credits
Bonus Features
1) Lusty Latin Ladies: Behind the Scenes
2) Maria Checca: Playmate Profile
Slide Show

The title of this video says it all...If you like sensual and shapely curves on tanned bodies, you will love this new video by Playboy.  Beautiful women grace beginning to end of this tape.  I can't wait for a  sequel...HOT!
